title: DERMALA Announces $6.73 Million Series A Financing to Expand and Scale Company's Personalized Microbiome-Based Solutions for Acne and Other Skin Conditions - Business Wire
body: About DERMALA. DERMALA, Inc. is a privately-held consumer dermatology company leveraging scientific understanding of the human microbiome to develop novel solutions for acne and other skin conditions.

title: DERMALA CEO AND FOUNDER INVITED AS SPEAKER AND PANELIST TO TWO UPCOMING INDUSTRY CONFERENCES - Markets Insider
body: DERMALA, Inc. is a San Diego-based company leveraging a scientific understanding of the human microbiome and data analytics to develop novel personalized treatments for chronic skin conditions.
